p: \bI've been waiting for you for a while, \pn.
\bIt's... good to see you again.
\bWow, you've grown.
\bIt's been really hard for me, not being able to help you.
\bBut... I want you to know how proud I am of you.
\bYou've accomplished so much. So much more than I have!
\bYou're a hero, \pn. The hero that I could never be.
\bIt hurts to say this, but you probably don't recognize me, right?
\bThere's no real way to tread lightly around this topic, so I'll just say it all at once.
\bMy name is Adam.
\bI'm your benefactor- I sent Mew to save you from Persephone.
\bI'm your father.
\bAnd... I'm the First Augur.
\bJeez, yeah, a lot to take in. I'm sorry about that.
\bI... I want to start by apologizing.
\bIt's my fault. Everything.
\bNot being there for you is only a small part of it.
\bI couldn't protect you from Persephone or Jaern.
\bI couldn't protect the crystal from falling into the wrong hands.
\b\pn, listen. The only reason you're involved in this situation in the first place is because of me.
\bThat Crystal is a near-limitless source of energy. It's really hard to get rid of someone with that kind of power.
\bPersephone got to where she was because she was smart.
\bThere's always a loophole.\nAnd even though that crystal made me close to immortal, she found one.
\bThe first time she summoned Darkrai, she used it's power to bring me here.
\bTo trap me inside the Nightmare Realm.\nYour Nightmare Realm.
\bThat way, I only existed inside your memory.
\bAnd then... she used her Gengar's Dream Eater to try and get rid of me forever.
\bThat's why you woke up with so few memories.\nThat's why this Nightmare Realm is so small.
\bIt was lucky I was able to wake you up in time.
\bI don't want to think about what would happen if I didn't.
\bIf I had to guess, that's why she also sealed Malde and your friend in here with you.
\bShe was hoping to deal with them in the same way.
\b...listen, \pn. I want nothing more than you to stay here with me...
\bBut time passes differently here. I don't know how long it's been on the surface, and there's a threat far worse than any cult that might be arriving soon.
\bYou need to get out of here, and quickly.
\bThere's only one way out.
\bJust like Mew chose to follow you, I was once chosen by Hoopa to be it's partner.
\bI released Hoopa a long time ago. I didn't have the power to escape.
\bBut you have two pieces of that crystal. With that kind of energy, you could use Hoopa's energy to get back to the real world.
\bI have... DNA. Just a little- but enough to allow your Mew to mimic Hoopa.
\bIf you want to control the power of those crystal shards though, you're going to need more than seven badges.
\bI was once the eighth Gym Leader, \pn.
\bIf you defeat me, I can give you your badge, fair and square.\nThen, you can use this DNA to escape this place forever.
\bI won't waste your time with Gym puzzles- like I said, I don't know how long we have.
\bI... love you more than anything else in the world.
\bI want you in the real world, not trapped in this literal nightmare, and I'll do anything it takes to make that happen.
\bGo. Heal your Pokemon. Prepare.
\bTalk to me when you're ready. This might be your best hope to get out of here.
B
\bI guess this is it. Your 8th Gym challenge.
\bI won't go easy on you- that would be insulting.
\bSo come on, \pn. Let's see if you really have surpassed me!
pbTrainerBattle(PBTrainers::LEADER_Adam,"Adam",_I("Wow. You're incredible."),false,0)
\bThat was incredible, \pn.
\bIt's really hard to believe that you've finally become stronger than me.
\bI guess that's how it is. Maybe I'm out of practice, being down here for so long.
$Trainer.badges[7]=true
$game_map.need_refresh=true
Obtained the Tartarus Badge!
\bAnd please, take this as well.\nI really hope it helps you.
Kernel.pbReceiveItem(PBItems::TMH3)
\bThat move is really a must-have for any trainer.
\bAnd... you'll need this.
Obtained the Hoopa DNA.\nMew can now use Hoopa's DNA to transform and use the Hyperspace Hole ability outside of battle.
pbGet(42)[6]=true
\bIf you look behind the Gym, there's an insignia on the wall.
\bUsing Hoopa's ability near it will allow you turn it into a wormhole- moving you to a very far away place.
\bHoopa itself is hidden somewhere in this realm. It ran away after I released it.
\bYou can try and find it if you'd like- but I'd recommend you go soon.
\bI'd love for you to stay, but I can't come with you.
\bPlus... Persephone's down here with me now.
\bAnd believe me, I want to have some words with her.
A
\rI'd love for you to stay, but I can't come with you.
\bPlus... Persephone's down here with me now.
\bAnd believe me, I want to have some words with her.
\bThe exit should be on the wall behind the gym.
\bErebus City is a mess.
\bYou saw it for yourself.
\bThat Deoxys virus that followed you down here...
\bWell, remember all of Persephone's cultists that Darkrai sent down?
\bThey've all gotten... changed.
\bThey're all part of that infected group now. I'm not exactly sure how it works.
\bEveryone in Erebus City is doing everything they can to hold them off, including me.
\bI can't talk for long. I need to help.
\bBut there's too many of them.
\bWe need... we need a trump card.
\b\pn. I'm not sure how much you know about how the Nightmare Realm works.
\bObviously it exists in your mind, all of this.
\bBut, the Nightmare Realm is all one land- there aren't seperate realms for each person.
\bThe parts of the Nightmare Realm for each person are seperated by a dangerous Badlands.
\bIn theory... by travelling through the Badlands, you could end up in somebody elses Nightmare Realm, but it's so dangerous nobody's tried.
\bBut somewhere in the center of it all, connecting the realms... is Rem Village.
\bIt's where Darkrai sleeps.
\b\pn. I need your help.
\bWe need to convince Darkrai to join us. A Pokemon like that could surely turn the tides of battle.
hlep
\bWill you help us?
Yes
No
Yes
\bThank you so much, \pn.
\bI have a Pokemon that can teleport you out to Prion Town, but from there you'll have to make your own way.
\bThe Badlands are just to the west.
\bPlease be safe.
\bAlakazam, show \pn what you can do! Teleport!
No
\bPlease, \pn. I'm begging you, here.
\bWe need you more than anything.
hlep
\bWell dang, \pn. You really do look older.
\bListen...
\bWhat do you know about the First Augur?
\bNot much, eh?
\bI guess nobody does anymore, with all that Jaern's done to censor my name out.
\bThat's right, my name. I am... er... was, the First Augur.
\bI'm not dead, although, being stuck in here, I might as well be.
\bI guess it's story time, isn't it?
\bThis was a few years ago, back when the Torren Region was a complete mess.
\bDespite that, life was amazing for me. I was happy, I had a family, I was a Gym Leader. I was even chosen by Hoopa , a legendary Pokemon!
\bBecause of it, I grew arrogant. I thought that somehow I alone could solve the problems in Torren.
\bSo when I saw one of the most respected trainers of all time... I messed up.
\bTurns out she's part of some group of legendary, incredible trainers.\nThey had seen the same problems I had, and I talked them into making a huge mistake.
\bWell dang, \pn. You really do look older.
\bListen...
\bWhat do you know about the First Augur?
\bNot much, eh?
\bI guess nobody does anymore, with all that Jaern's done to censor my name out.
\bThat's right, my name. I am... er... was, the First Augur.
\bI'm not dead, although, being stuck in here, I might as well be.
\bI guess it's story time, isn't it?
\bThis was a few years ago, back when the Torren Region was a complete mess.
\bDespite that, life was amazing for me. I was happy, I had a family, I was a Gym Leader. I was even chosen by Hoopa , a legendary Pokemon!
\bBecause of it, I grew arrogant. I thought that somehow I alone could solve the problems in Torren.
\bSo when I saw one of the most respected trainers of all time... I messed up.
\bTurns out she's part of some group of legendary, incredible trainers.\nThey had seen the same problems I had, and I talked them into making a huge mistake.
\bWell dang, \pn. You really do look older.
\bListen...
\bWhat do you know about the First Augur?
\bNot much, eh?
\bI guess nobody does anymore, with all that Jaern's done to censor my name out.
\bThat's right, my name. I am... er... was, the First Augur.
\bI'm not dead, although, being stuck in here, I might as well be.
\bI guess it's story time, isn't it?
\bThis was a few years ago, back when the Torren Region was a complete mess.
\bDespite that, life was amazing for me. I was happy, I had a family, I was a Gym Leader. I was even chosen by Hoopa , a legendary Pokemon!
\bBecause of it, I grew arrogant. I thought that somehow I alone could solve the problems in Torren.
\bSo when I saw one of the most respected trainers of all time... I messed up.
\bTurns out she's part of some group of legendary, incredible trainers.\nThey had seen the same problems I had, and I talked them into making a huge mistake.
\bI lost.
\bI bit off more than I could chew.
\bI thought I was undefeatable- and in a way, I kind of was.
\bWith Arceus's ancient crystal, I couldn't die or be defeated.
\b... but I learned a very important lesson that day.
\bNever go up against somebody smarter than you.
\bBecause even invulnerability has a loophole.
\bIt was clever, I admit.
\bExactly one year ago, Persephone and Jaern had the bright idea of using my family against me.
\bTo protect my daughter, I had to stop fighting.
\bBut even then- even with my not fighting back- I was still invulnerable.
\bThis was the first time that Persephone met Darkrai. She convinced it to seal me away in the dreams of my daughter.
\bTo protect my son, I had to stop fighting.
\bBut even then- even with my not fighting back- I was still invulnerable.
\bThis was the first time that Persephone met Darkrai. She convinced it to seal me away in the dreams of my son.
\bAnd then her Gengar used Dream Eater.
\bLuckily... I was able to contact my partner, Hoopa, who was still in the normal world.
\bI had it send Mew to rescue you, and I woke you up and guided you out.
\bI've been watching your quest.
\bAlready, you're doing so much better than I am.
\bYou've already defeated Audrey and Zenith.
\bYou're the hero of this story, not me.
\bAnd it's up to you to reunite this crystal, to return it to its guardians and stop this Giratina group.
\bThey've been manipulating us since forever.
\bI'm not sure why exactly, but they want that crystal.
\bThat entire prophecy business? That fake prophet you met again in the Infernal Base?
\bWhatever mind abilities Zenith had?
\bIt all ties back to them. I just wish I knew more about them.
\b\pn. The only way out of the Dream Realm is with a legendary Pokemon.
\bHoopa could have gotten me out, but I was sent here without it.
\bDarkrai's probably forgotten about me.
\bBut you have Mew, and with an eighth badge, it'll be able to Transform to copy Hoopa's ability, Hyperspace Hole.
\bYou can get out of here.
\bBut to get that badge, you'll need to win it fair and square.
\bI know it's a lot to take in... and I'm sorry for that.
\bIt's not easy to tell you all of this. I wish I could have softened it.
\bBut you have a world to save. We don't have time.
\bThis is a battle that needs to happen.
\bIt's time to begin. I hope you're ready.
\bFather against daughter... this is the battle of the century.
\bFather against son... this is the battle of the century.
pbTrainerIntro(:LEADER_Adam)
$PokemonGlobal.nextBattleBack="Dark"
pbTrainerBattle(PBTrainers::LEADER_Adam,"Adam",_I("Congratulations. You've surpassed me."),false,0)
A
\bAmazing. You've surpassed me, \pn.
\bCongratulations. You deserve this more than anyone else I know.
$Trainer.badges[7]=true
$game_map.need_refresh=true
Obtained the Tartarus Badge!
\bAnd please, take this as well.
Kernel.pbReceiveItem(PBItems::TM120)
\bDark Matter is a powerful move, but its user will need to recharge the next turn.
\bAnd... you'll need this.
Obtained the Hoopa DNA.\nMew can now use Hoopa's DNA to transform and use the Hyperspace Hole ability outside of battle.
pbGet(42)[6]=true
\bListen. Behind my Gym there is a small cave with an insignia on the wall.
\bThese are the insignias marking closed portals- Hoopa can use these to travel from place to place.
\bYou can use that to get back to the real world.
\bListen, \pn, as much as I want to talk to you...
\bWell, you need to get going.
\bWe have so much to discuss, but we'll need to save it for another time.
\bTime passes differently in the Dream Realm, who knows what you could have missed?
\bYou need to get the rest of the shards of that crystal!
\bYou can't let those Giratina creeps get what they want!
\bHurry, and good luck.
pbTrainerEnd
\bI lost.
\bI bit off more than I could chew.
\bI thought I was undefeatable- and in a way, I kind of was.
\bWith Arceus's ancient crystal, I couldn't die or be defeated.
\b... but I learned a very important lesson that day.

\bThis was the first time that Persephone met Darkrai. She convinced it to seal me away in the dreams of my son.
\bAnd then her Gengar used Dream Eater.
\bLuckily... I was able to contact my partner, Hoopa, who was still in the normal world.
\bI had it send Mew to rescue you, and I woke you up and guided you out.
\bI've been watching your quest.
\bAlready, you're doing so much better than I am.
\bYou've already defeated Audrey and Zenith.
\bYou're the hero of this story, not me.
\bAnd it's up to you to reunite this crystal, to return it to its guardians and stop this Giratina group.
\bThey've been manipulating us since forever.
\bI'm not sure why exactly, but they want that crystal.
\bThat entire prophecy business? That fake prophet you met again in the Infernal Base?
\bWhatever mind abilities Zenith had?
\bIt all ties back to them. I just wish I knew more about them.
\b\pn. The only way out of the Dream Realm is with a legendary Pokemon.
\bHoopa could have gotten me out, but I was sent here without it.
\bDarkrai's probably forgotten about me.
\bBut you have Mew, and with an eighth badge, it'll be able to Transform to copy Hoopa's ability, Hyperspace Hole.
\bYou can get out of here.
\bBut to get that badge, you'll need to win it fair and square.
\bI know it's a lot to take in... and I'm sorry for that.
\bIt's not easy to tell you all of this. I wish I could have softened it.
\bBut you have a world to save. We don't have time.
\bThis is a battle that needs to happen.
\bIt's time to begin. I hope you're ready.
\bFather against daughter... this is the battle of the century.
\bFather against son... this is the battle of the century.

\bI thought I was undefeatable- and in a way, I kind of was.
\bWith Arceus's ancient crystal, I couldn't die or be defeated.
\b... but I learned a very important lesson that day.
\bNever go up against somebody smarter than you.
\bBecause even invulnerability has a loophole.
\bIt was clever, I admit.
\bExactly one year ago, Persephone and Jaern had the bright idea of using my family against me.

\bThis was the first time that Persephone met Darkrai. She convinced it to seal me away in the dreams of my son.
\bAnd then her Gengar used Dream Eater.
\bLuckily... I was able to contact my partner, Hoopa, who was still in the normal world.
\bI had it send Mew to rescue you, and I woke you up and guided you out.
\bI've been watching your quest.
\bAlready, you're doing so much better than I am.
\bYou've already defeated Audrey and Zenith.
\bYou're the hero of this story, not me.
\bAnd it's up to you to reunite this crystal, to return it to its guardians and stop this Giratina group.
\bThey've been manipulating us since forever.
\bI'm not sure why exactly, but they want that crystal.
\bThat entire prophecy business? That fake prophet you met again in the Infernal Base?
\bWhatever mind abilities Zenith had?
\bIt all ties back to them. I just wish I knew more about them.
\b\pn. The only way out of the Dream Realm is with a legendary Pokemon.
\bHoopa could have gotten me out, but I was sent here without it.
\bDarkrai's probably forgotten about me.
\bBut you have Mew, and with an eighth badge, it'll be able to Transform to copy Hoopa's ability, Hyperspace Hole.
\bYou can get out of here.
\bBut to get that badge, you'll need to win it fair and square.
\bI know it's a lot to take in... and I'm sorry for that.
\bIt's not easy to tell you all of this. I wish I could have softened it.
\bBut you have a world to save. We don't have time.
\bThis is a battle that needs to happen.
\bIt's time to begin. I hope you're ready.
\bFather against daughter... this is the battle of the century.
\bFather against son... this is the battle of the century.

Kernel.pbReceiveItem(PBItems::TM120)
\bDark Matter is a powerful move, but its user will need to recharge the next turn.
\bAnd... you'll need this.
Obtained the Hoopa DNA.\nMew can now use Hoopa's DNA to transform and use the Hyperspace Hole ability outside of battle.
pbGet(42)[6]=true
\bListen. Behind my Gym there is a small cave with an insignia on the wall.
\bThese are the insignias marking closed portals- Hoopa can use these to travel from place to place.
\bYou can use that to get back to the real world.
\bListen, \pn, as much as I want to talk to you...
\bWell, you need to get going.
\bWe have so much to discuss, but we'll need to save it for another time.
\bTime passes differently in the Dream Realm, who knows what you could have missed?
\bYou need to get the rest of the shards of that crystal!
\bYou can't let those Giratina creeps get what they want!
\bHurry, and good luck.
pbTrainerEnd
\bWe have so much to discuss, but we'll need to save it for another time.

\bYou need to get the rest of the shards of that crystal!
\bYou can't let those Giratina creeps get what they want!
\bHurry, and good luck.
\bI'm so glad you came back. You really have a knack for showing up at the right time.
\bErebus City is a mess right now.
\bThat Deoxys virus that followed you down here...
\bWell, remember all of Persephone's cultists that Darkrai sent down?
\bThey've all gotten... changed.
\bThey're all part of that old guy's side now. I'm not exactly sure how it works.
\bWe're trying our best to hold them off. I've been fighting dozens at once.
\bBut there's too many of them.
\bWe need... we need a trump card.
\b\pn. I'm not sure how much you know about how the Dream Realm works.
\bObviously it exists in your mind, all of this.
\bBut, humanity's Dream Realm is all one land- there aren't separate realms for each person.
\bThe parts of the Dream Realm for each person are separated by dangerous Badlands.
\bIn theory... by travelling through the Badlands, you could end up in somebody else's Dream Realm.
\bIt's dangerous- nobody's really ever tried.
\bBut somewhere in the center of it all, connecting the realms... is Rem Village.
\bRem Village, according to the stories, is the place between all the Dream Realms, where Darkrai rests.
\bWe need to convince Darkrai to join us. A Pokemon like that could surely turn the tides of battle.
hlep
\bWill you help us?
Yes
No
Yes
\bThank you. So much.
\bI have a Pokemon that can teleport you to Prion Town, but from there you'll have to make your own way.
\bThe Badlands are just to the west of it.
\bBe safe. I believe in you.
\bAlakazam! Come on out!
\bAlakazam, show 'em what you can do! Teleport!
No
\bPlease, \pn. I'm begging you, here.
\bWe need you more than anything.
